@MentalFitnessXX @dreddiemurphy @DCYAPress @jesskellynt @zeminarevent Hi Anne, If you go to the DCYA website, they are actually inviting submissions until 23rd February on any relevant issue - so that would seem a good point to make. my lecture will focus on young people in care - and your point is relevant there too
the lecture will be in the Thomas Davis Theatre in the Arts Building

Our Child Care Act 1991 up for review. @DCYAPress looking for suggestions. I am giving a public lecture offering my take on priority issues for improving legal /policy provision for children and young people in care. Mon 12th Feb. 6.15pm. @DCYAPress are looking for suggestions on how to reform the Child Care Act 1991.
